lead_paragraph: Embattled Force India co-owner Vijay Mallya will not be attending Sunday's Spanish Grand Prix but he is hoping for a change of fortune on the track at least for his Formula One team in Barcelona.

headline.print_headline: Absent Mallya Hopes for Force India Boost in Spain
headline.main: Absent Mallya Hopes for Force India Boost in Spain

snippet: Embattled Force India co-owner Vijay Mallya will not be attending Sunday's Spanish Grand Prix but he is hoping for a change of fortune on the track at least for his Formula One team in Barcelona....
